name: Super Chrono Runner
description:
Super Chrono Runner is a simple but fun platformer, in which the player has to avoid aging in order to progress through the levels. Luckily, the resident Evil Megacorp that cursed our main character to his rapid aging process also provides a rejuvenating serum, available at practically every vending machine. But beware, for the path is strewn with laser barriers, killbots and even incinerators lacking proper public works safety regulation.

Sprites and music by: @b-a-bashington
